messages.title: Hello...
messages.message: My name is RXE1011. You can call me "Roxie" for short. I need your help!

messages.title: Please help...
messages.message: I’ve crash-landed my spaceship here and now it’s lost in these cornfields. Please help me find all the parts!

messages.title: Drag and drop
messages.message:
To help me find part of my spaceship, drag an arrow on the left to the instruction stage.


Once you've arranged arrows the way you want, press the Green button and I will follow your instructions through the maze.

messages.title: Thanks!
messages.message: Great! Thank you for helping me find that. Let’s try and find another one.

messages.title: North, South, East, West.
messages.message: Use more arrows to guide me to the next piece. If you make a mistake, you can drag an arrow off the stage.
